title: Update centralized marketing site contact info

requirements.summary: Update centralized CONTACT_CONFIG phone and email so header, footer, and Service Areas contact block reflect the new clickable tel/mailto values.
acceptanceCriteria: `CONTACT_CONFIG.phone.tel` is set to a tel:-friendly E.164 value for the same number: "+17038643078" so `getTelHref()` resolves to `tel:+17038643078`.
`CONTACT_CONFIG.email.address` is set to: "solutionsclearchoice@gmail.com" so `getMailtoHref()` resolves to `mailto:solutionsclearchoice@gmail.com`.

The updated phone number and email appear on the public marketing site anywhere `CONTACT_CONFIG` is rendered (including header, footer, and the Service Areas section contact block), with clickable tel: and mailto: links.

file_operations.description: Update CONTACT_CONFIG values to phone.display="703 864 3078", phone.tel="+17038643078", and email.address="solutionsclearchoice@gmail.com" so all components importing CONTACT_CONFIG/getTelHref/getMailtoHref automatically render the updated contact details without hardcoding.
